entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 07:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
